about_the_game: The Living Weapons Pack adds new in-game missions that unlock three pieces of exclusive, powerful equipment: the Samnu Armor Set, the Danchev AR (Acid Assault Rifle), and the Danchev MG (Poison Machine Gun).

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains missions in which the player must fight aliens. In those fights, there are depictions of science-fiction violence using guns and melee weapons.

detailed_description: The Living Weapons Pack adds new in-game missions that unlock three pieces of exclusive, powerful equipment: the Samnu Armor Set, the Danchev AR (Acid Assault Rifle), and the Danchev MG (Poison Machine Gun).
